original_text: The crowd saw that neither Jesus nor his disciples were still there. So they got into the boats and they went to Capernaum. They went there to look for Jesus.
korean_text: 무리가 거기에 예수도 안 계시고 제자들도 없음을 보고 곧 배들을 타고 예수를 찾으러 가버나움으로 가서

sentences.original_text: nor his disciples were still there
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 제자들도 여전히 그곳에 없었다는 것을

sentences.original_text: So they got into the boats
They went there to look for Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 예수님을 찾기 위해 그곳으로 갔다
